name: erpnext-ithm-education-portal
description: ERPNext Education Portal for Institute of Tourism and Hospitality Management

scripts.backup: docker-compose exec erpnext bench --site ithm.local backup
scripts.restore: docker-compose exec erpnext bench --site ithm.local restore
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec erpnext bench --site ithm.local migrate
scripts.console: docker-compose exec erpnext bench --site ithm.local console

author: Institute of Tourism and Hospitality Management
